info.title: API Documentation
info.description:
API for mobile app

Run `php artisan l5-swagger:generate` to generate updated API documentation

parameters.name: sensor
parameters.description:
Sensor ID:
- 1: Oxygen Sensor
- 2: TDS Sensor
- 3: Temperature Sensor
- 4: PH Sensor

get.summary: List of sensor types for a sensor unit
Retrieve the details of a specific switch unit
get.description: Returns the details of the specified switch unit.

get.summary: List of switch types for a switch unit

patch.summary: Update the status of all switches in a switch unit

switchesStatus.description: Array of statuses for the switches (0 for off, 1 for on)

id.description: The unique identifier of the resource

mqtt_data_id.description: The unique identifier of the mqtt data

sensor_type_id.description: The unique identifier of the sensor type

switch_unit_id.description: The unique identifier of the switch unit

switch_type_id.description: The unique identifier of the switch type

created_at.description: The date and time of the resource created

id.description: The unique identifier for the sensor.

serial_number.description: The serial number of the sensor.

id.description: The unique identifier for the sensor type.

name.description: The name of the sensor type.

slug.description: The slug of the sensor type.

status.description: The status of the sensor type.
